document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2013-05
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AMENDING SECTIONS 5.12.230 THROUGH 5.12.380 (CARDROOM ADMISSION TAX PROVISIONS) OF CHAPTER 5.12 (CARDROOMS) OF THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE, CHANGING THE DESIGNATION OF THE CARDROOM ADMISSION TAX TO A GROSS RECEIPTS TAX IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE PROVISIONS OF THE SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT AND STIPULATION FOR ENTRY OF JUDGMENT IN BVK GAMING, INC. V. CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, ET AL. (NAPA COUNTY SUPERIOR COURT CASE NO. 26-57480)
